meanings.definition: The holding of a conference among people in different locations by means of telecommunications technology.
meanings.sent1: Teleconferencing allows people in different places to have a meeting using technology.
meanings.sent2: We had a productive teleconferencing session with our colleagues from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The teleconferencing call was so clear, it felt like everyone was in the same room!
meanings.sent4: Through teleconferencing, it's as if distance disappears and we are all together.
meanings.sent5: The convenience of teleconferencing saves time and money for businesses.

meanings.definition: A conference held by means of telecommunications technology.
meanings.sent1: During the teleconferencing, all participants could see each other on the screen.
meanings.sent2: The teleconferencing equipment allowed for seamless communication between the teams.
meanings.sent3: The teleconferencing setup made it look like we were all in a sci-fi movie!
meanings.sent4: In the world of teleconferencing, the possibilities for virtual meetings are endless.
meanings.sent5: Teleconferencing revolutionizes the way we connect and collaborate with others.
